A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

description:
Markovify is a simple, extensible Markov chain generator. Right now, its
primary use is for building Markov models of large corpora of text and
generating random sentences from that.
name: py-markovify

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
